com.deezer.sdk.player.event

Interface OnBufferProgressListener


  • public interface OnBufferProgressListener
    Defines the behavior of a listener of the buffer's progress. It will be notified of the progress of the percentage of data beeing buffered.
    Author:
    Deezer
    See Also:
    Player

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBufferProgress(double percent)
      Callback method that will be called when the buffer's position changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onBufferProgress

        void onBufferProgress(double percent)
        Callback method that will be called when the buffer's position changes.
        Parameters:
        percent - the percentage of data buffered. The player/bufferManager can be customized to send event at a desired interval.
